attributes.action: Present to the nation the total and ongoing costs of the IRAQ and AFGANISTAN wars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we are one of the most taxed nations in the world, with the Tax burden growing each year, we think it is for the good of the nation, that we are told the cost of these wars. So we the people can see what proportion of the tax is going towards these wars.
